Package hospitalsystem.appointmentcontrol

Class DoctorAppointmentControl

java.lang.Object
hospitalsystem.appointmentcontrol.AppointmentControl
hospitalsystem.appointmentcontrol.DoctorAppointmentControl
public class DoctorAppointmentControl extends AppointmentControl
Controls and manages doctor-specific appointment operations in the hospital system. This class provides functionality for handling doctor appointments, including slot generation, appointment status management, and schedule viewing.
Since:
2024-11-19
Author:
Gracelynn, Leo

    • getAvailableSlots

      public static List<Appointment> getAvailableSlots(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves all available appointment slots for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose available slots are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a sorted list of available appointments for the specified doctor

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getUpcomingAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves all upcoming appointments for a specific doctor from the current date/time.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose upcoming appointments are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a sorted list of upcoming appointments for the specified doctor

    • generateNextWeekSlots

      public static void generateNextWeekSlots(Doctor doctor)
      Generates appointment slots for the next week for a specific doctor. Slots are generated for Monday through Friday at specific times: 9:00, 10:30, 13:00, and 14:30.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor for whom slots are to be generated

    • displayAvailableSlots

      public static void displayAvailableSlots(List<Appointment> slots)
      Displays available appointment slots with their status. Shows only slots with PENDING or CANCELLED status.
      Parameters:
      slots - the list of appointment slots to display

    • displayUnavailableSlots

      public static void displayUnavailableSlots(List<Appointment> slots)
      Displays unavailable appointment slots with their status. Shows only slots with UNAVAILABLE or BOOKED status.
      Parameters:
      slots - the list of appointment slots to display

    • displayPendingAppointments

      public static void displayPendingAppointments(List<Appointment> appointments)
      Displays pending appointment requests with patient details.
      Parameters:
      appointments - the list of appointments to display

    • displayBookedAppointments

      public static void displayBookedAppointments(List<Appointment> appointments)
      Displays booked appointments with patient details.
      Parameters:
      appointments - the list of appointments to display

    • displayPersonalSchedule

      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose schedule is to be displayed

      Displays upcoming appointments for a doctor with patient details.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose upcoming appointments are to be displayed

    • markSlotUnavailable

      public static void markSlotUnavailable(Doctor doctor, Appointment appointment)
      Marks a specific appointment slot as unavailable. Updates the appointment status in the database.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose slot is being marked
      appointment - the appointment to be marked as unavailable

    • markSlotAvailable

      public static void markSlotAvailable(Doctor doctor, Appointment appointment)
      Marks a specific appointment slot as available. Updates the appointment status in the database.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose slot is being marked
      appointment - the appointment to be marked as available

    • acceptAppointment

      public static void acceptAppointment(Doctor doctor, Appointment appointment)
      Accepts a pending appointment request. Changes the appointment status to BOOKED.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor accepting the appointment
      appointment - the appointment to be accepted

    • declineAppointment

      public static void declineAppointment(Doctor doctor, Appointment appointment)
      Declines a pending appointment request. Changes the appointment status to CANCELLED and marks the slot as available.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor declining the appointment
      appointment - the appointment to be declined

    • recordOutcome

      public static void recordOutcome(Appointment appointment, String notes, Prescription prescription)
      Records the outcome of a completed appointment including consultation notes and prescription. Changes the appointment status to COMPLETED.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment whose outcome is being recorded
      notes - the consultation notes
      prescription - the prescription issued during the appointment

    • createMedicineSet

      public static Prescription.MedicineSet createMedicineSet(Medicine medicine, int quantity)
      Creates a new medicine set with specified quantity for a prescription.
      Parameters:
      medicine - the medicine to be prescribed
      quantity - the quantity of medicine to be prescribed
      Returns:
      a new MedicineSet object containing the medicine and quantity

    • addMedicineToPrescription

      public static void addMedicineToPrescription(Prescription prescription, Medicine medicine, int quantity)
      Adds a medicine with specified quantity to an existing prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescription - the prescription to which medicine is to be added
      medicine - the medicine to be added
      quantity - the quantity of medicine to be added
